Com_Talk_02c:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_01>A good transaction is one that satisfies
both parties. So...are you satisfied?
If you're still selling, I'm still buying!
Com_Talk_02d:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>Thanks for coming to me! Anything else
you want to sell? I'll give you a good deal!
Talk1028b:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy>It won't warm you up like a <clr:0000>bonfire <clr:ffff>will,
but it's hard to beat it for size and
sheer brightness.
Talk1028:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey there. <sp:5:0:0>Are you here because you
spotted the <clr:0000>bonfires<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>The blizzard makes it hard to see where
you're going, so we keep these bonfires
going as a beacon for lost travelers.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>They eat up a lot of firewood, but it's
worth it—you can spot them even from
up in the air!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>Though as proud as I am of them, they
can't beat the spotlights set up around
that fancy <clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff>.
Talk1030b:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>It hurts to admit, but I don't see how our
<clr:0000>bonfires <clr:ffff>can compete with that.
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>This is the armor shop <clr:0000>Brazen Beak<clr:ffff>.
I'm happy to say we're open for business!
Com_Talk_05b:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Feel free to take your time picking
through your pouch. No pressure.
Com_Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>Not buying it after all? That's a shame.
Well, feel free to keep looking around.
Talk1029:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you lose your way in the blizzard,
you can count on our <clr:0000>bonfires <clr:ffff>to help
get you oriented.
Com_Talk_13: <sp:3:0:2:0000>How many do you want to sell?
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>This is the armor shop <clr:0000>Brazen Beak<clr:ffff>.
I'm happy to say we're open for business!<sp:0:4:0>Our armor is perfect for <clr:0000>protecting
yourself against the cold<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>If you're heading into the mountains, the
cold gets pretty biting there. Prepare for
it now or regret it later!
Talk1029b_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you lose your way in the blizzard,
you can count on our <clr:0000>bonfires <clr:ffff>to help
get you oriented...
Com_Talk_05d:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Go ahead and sell me whatever. It's all
stuff you probably don't need anyway.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal>Ah, the thing is... It looks like your bag
is full. I'd be happy to buy anything you
don't need off of you.
Talk1029b_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal>All right, I admit it.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Once that <clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff>'s flashy lights
get going, it'll make for a way better
landmark than my bonfires.<sp:5:1:0>
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>Sorry to have to tell you this, but...<sp:5:1:0> That's
one of the few things I won't buy.
Talk1029b_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Probably better that you rely on that thing
once they switch it on. I know when I'm
being outshone.
Talk1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>I might be sold out now, but I'll get more
in soon. Buy as many as you like so you
can dye 'em up special!
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal>Wait a minute! I'm not buying anything
you're wearing until you take it off first.
Com_Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Ahh, looking to sell? We can do that!
What are you selling?
Com_Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Thanks! Anything else you want to
sell me?
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Wait, do you already have the whole
Rito getup?<sp:5:1:0> Thanks for coming back
again and again!
<sp:3:0:2:0100>I appreciate your business!
Talk1028b_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey there. <sp:5:0:0>Are you here because you
spotted the <clr:0000>bonfires<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>The blizzard makes it hard to see where
you're going, so we keep these bonfires
going as a beacon for lost travelers.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>They eat up a lot of firewood, but it's
worth it—you can spot them even from
up in the air!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>That said, our <clr:0000>bonfires<clr:ffff> might not always
be the brightest thing around.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Have you seen what they built over there?
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>You know, a stylish customer passing
through told me there's someplace out
there that can <clr:0000>dye <clr:ffff>clothing.<sp:0:4:0>If you buy extra sets and dye them each
different colors, you can wear whatever
outfits suit you on a given day!<sp:0:4:0>What won't people do in the name of
fashion, right?
Talk1028b_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The Hylians are pretty incredible to have
built something so impressive.
Talk1028b_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy>What were they calling it? A <clr:0000>Skyview
Tower <clr:ffff>or something?<sp:0:4:0>It's still dark right now, but when it's
turned on, they say it'll light up the sky
pretty far out.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I doubt it'll warm you up like a <clr:0000>bonfire<clr:ffff>,
but it'll be hard to beat it for size and
sheer brightness.<sp:0:4:0>Pretty soon, my <clr:0000>bonfires <clr:ffff>won't be quite
the landmark they are now.
Talk1028b_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:TalkPositive>The Hylians are pretty incredible to have
built something so impressive.
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>Hey, thanks for coming out so late!<clr:0000><sp:0:4:0>Brazen Beak <clr:ffff>is open 24 hours.
Stop by whenever!
Talk1006: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>So then, what can I do for you today?
Talk1009: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Now then, what else can I do for you?
Talk1029b:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal>Although... Let's be honest—the <clr:0000>Skyview
Tower <clr:ffff>is much easier to spot with all the
lights set up around it.
Talk2001:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy_00>When the blizzard drove off most of the
adults, the kids hung in there and kept
things going. That includes the shops.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>I can't express enough how much we owe
the little ones. They're the saviors of
this village.
Com_Talk_02b:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Thanks for your business! So...is that it?
You don't want to sell anything else?
